name: Monster Dune Buggy Trail
description: Ride this Monster Dune Buggy through sand dunes, snow mountains and rocky roads and perform fancy tricks and experience hours of fun with this Monster Dune Buggy Trail Missions game. Your Aim in this Awesome offered game is to pass through all the checkpoints (rings) and continue to next level. Be very careful when you take high jump sand when descending from Steep hills if you don't land on wheels the Buggy may Blast into ashes.
